document.full_text: libya said sunday muammar gaddafi's youngest son and three grandchildren were killed in a nato air strike and britain said that while it was not targeting the leader, it was homing in on his military machine.
document.title: libya says gaddafi survives air strikes, but son killed
lines_and_colors: libya said sunday muammar gaddafi's youngest son and three grandchildren were killed in a nato air strike and britain said that while it was not targeting the leader, it was homing in on his military machine.
